name: Untitled Spaceship Game
description:
This is a simple proof of concept to test a game idea on a smaller scope. 
the game is about exploring a abandoned void ship, the goal is to get off the ship and escape, but at the same time to find out what happened to the crew and what your doing there.

<> - This game contains content that may trigger some people (blood and mentions of self harm)

______________________________________

Controls:

WASD )- Move

Mouse )- Look

E )- Pickup Items 

F )- Drop Item

SPACE )- Use Item
